name: The Empire Dining Table
description: The Empire is a statement dining table demonstrates the capabilities of 21st modern furniture design with its alluring modern silhouette, available in a range of luxurious finishes. This dining table is the perfect choice for a modern dining room where the aim is to create the wow factor. The slimline top enhances the table's chic contemporary appeal with a distinguishing feature being its narrow edge and smooth facetted underside, standing proudly on two bold semi-conical pedestals reflecting a table full of personality and charisma. The Empire is ideal for lavish dinner parties and glamourous get to togethers due to the sociable nature of an oval top, available in a range of sizes including an 8-seater, 10- seater and 12-seater with custom sizes also available upon request.
